participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Curious and down-to-earth, loves to learn new things and prefers a simple lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and compassionate, with a strong sense of justice and a desire for freedom.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was 20.
